Package com.i2group.apollo.adminservice

The i2 Analyze admin service provides clients with the ability to perform administrative functions on the whole system.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAdminService
    A set of methods for performing administrative functions on a running instance of i2 Analyze.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SchemaValidationException.Fault
    Contains information about the enclosing SchemaValidationException.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SchemaValidationException
    The exception raised when an attempt is made to use an invalid schema.

Package com.i2group.apollo.adminservice Description

The i2 Analyze admin service provides clients with the ability to perform administrative functions on the whole system.

The admin service contains four methods that affect fundamental features of i2 Analyze.

Web methodDescription
SetChartingSchemes Specifies the charting schemes for this instance of i2 Analyze.
SetRepositoryName Specifies a human-readable name that identifies the Analysis Repository to users of i2 Analyze. The name can be updated at any time.
SetSchema Specifies the schema for this instance of i2 Analyze. If no Analysis Repository is present, a new one is created. Subsequent calls update the schema, subject to strict rules about how the new schema can differ from the current one.
SetSecuritySchema Specifies the security schema for this instance of i2 Analyze. Subsequent calls update the security schema, subject to strict rules about how the new schema can differ from the current one.

Note: Each "Set" method has a corresponding "Get" method that retrieves the existing setting (if any) from i2 Analyze.

Since:
2.0
